SpokenText: A localized version of the text that is actually spoken phonetically in the audio.
SubtitleOverride: A localized version of the subtitle text that should be displayed for this audio. By default this will be the same as the Spoken Text.
VoiceActorDirection: Provides general notes to the voice actor intended to direct their performance, as well as contextual information to the translator.
ContextMappings: Mappings between dialogue contexts and associated soundwaves.
bMature: true if this dialogue is considered to contain mature/adult content.
